sentences.en: By perseverance the crippled boy learned how to swim.
sentences.cn: 那个跛足的男孩通过不屈不挠的努力学会了游泳.

sentences.en: By perseverance the lame boy learned to swim.
sentences.cn: 靠毅力这跛童学会了游泳.

sentences.en: He's a clever man,but fails in perseverance.
sentences.cn: 他是一个聪明人，但缺乏毅力。

sentences.en: It may take some perseverance to find the right people.
sentences.cn: 要找到合适的人也许需要有点锲而不舍的精神.

sentences.en: It took perseverance to overcome his reading problems.
sentences.cn: 由于坚持不懈，他才得以克服阅读障碍。

sentences.en: It was now that I applauded my perseverance and address.
sentences.cn: 我自己赞美我的耐性同我的妙法.

sentences.en: Little companies are known for their pluck and perseverance, even in the face of a recession.
sentences.cn: 小公司的勇气和坚毅是出了名的，即使面对经济衰退也是如此。

sentences.en: My perseverance was getting me somewhere.
sentences.cn: 我锲而不舍，总算有了一些进展。

sentences.en: Opportunities are not offered. They must be wrested and worked for. And this calls for perseverance and courage.--Indira Gandhi
sentences.cn: 机会不会从天而降，必须怀揣坚持与勇气去努力争取。

sentences.en: Perseverance combined with energy is necessary to success in life.
sentences.cn: 毅力加上精力是人生成功的要素.
忍耐是成功的重要条件.

sentences.en: She was ever remarkable for her perseverance, for her industry.
sentences.cn: 她向来就以具有不屈不挠的精神, 刻苦用功而著称.

sentences.en: So , with great perseverance and untiring industry, he prospered.
sentences.cn: 因此, 他靠了自己的坚毅顽强和不懈努力发达起来了.

sentences.en: The Australian team had the added ingredient of perseverance.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队另外还具备了顽强的意志.

sentences.en: Their power does not come from rank or title but from intellect and perseverance.
sentences.cn: 他们的权力并非来自等级或头衔，而是来自他们的智慧和毅力。

sentences.en: They showed great perseverance in the face of difficulty.
sentences.cn: 他们面对困难表现了坚强的毅力。

words.tran_cn: 固执的，坚持的；持久稳固的
持续言语（指言语反复不止的病态）；持续重复的行为；执拗
患持续言语症；表现固执
坚持；不屈不挠；固执己见（在辩论中）

trans.tran_cn: 毅力 ，韧性，不屈不挠的精神
trans.tran_en: determination to keep trying to achieve something in spite of difficulties – use this to show approval
